cast.overview: A boy growing up in Dublin during the 1980s escapes his strained family life by starting a band to impress the mysterious girl he likes.
cast.title: Sing Street

details.biography: Tony Doyle is an actor, writer, director and producer from Dublin, Ireland. He was the lead in the short film "11th Hour" opposite academy award nominee Salma Hayek. The film was directed by fellow Academy nominee Jim Sheridan. He has appeared in a host TV shows and movies that have screened at international film festivals like Tribecca, Sundance, Berlinale and TIFF.
details.name: Tony Doyle
